properties.name: spring.cloud.tencent.rpc-enhancement.reporter.ignore-internal-server-error
properties.description: If ignore "Internal Server Error Http Status Code (500)".

properties.name: spring.cloud.tencent.rpc-enhancement.reporter.series
properties.description: Specify List of HTTP status series that needs to be reported as FAILED when status list is empty.

properties.name: spring.cloud.tencent.rpc-enhancement.reporter.statuses
properties.description: Specify the Http status code(s) that needs to be reported as FAILED.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.enabled
properties.description: Enable polaris stat reporter or not.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.host
properties.description: Local host for prometheus to pull.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.pushgateway.address
properties.description: Required host:port or ip:port of the pushGateway.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.pushgateway.enabled
properties.description: Enable publishing via a Prometheus pushGateway.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.pushgateway.grouping-keys
properties.description: Used to group metrics in pushGateway. eg:instance:instanceName

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.pushgateway.job
properties.description: Required identifier for this application instance.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.pushgateway.push-rate
properties.description: Frequency with which to push metrics to pushGateway,default 1 minutes.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.stat.pushgateway.shut-down-strategy
properties.description: PushGateway shutDownStrategy when application is is shut-down.
